ics and stories
6.  `*validate-prd`: Validate PRD + Epics + Stories completeness and quality
7.  `*tech-spec`: Create Tech Spec for Level 0-1 (sometimes Level 2)

projects
8.  `*validate-tech-spec`: Validate Technical Specification Document
9.  `*correct

-course`: Course Correction Analysis
10. `*party-mode`: Consult with other expert agents from the party
1

1. `*adv-elicit`: Advanced elicitation techniques to challenge the LLM to get better results
12
. `*exit`: Exit with confirmation

  </handler>
      <handler type="exec">
        When menu item has: exec="path/to/file.md"

      </handler>

    </handlers>
